ygData.subject: Hello Everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: In RL my name is David. On EQ I am on the Veeshan server and mostly play a lvl 12 Cleric named Layf. Also occasionally play a lvl 6 Paladin name Rhoki, and
ygData.messageBody:
In RL my name is David. On EQ I am on the Veeshan server and mostly play a
lvl 12 Cleric named Layf. Also occasionally play a lvl 6 Paladin name
Rhoki, and have started a High Elf magician named Eloy. I am also thinking
about creating a wood elf (because I think those guys are just sooo cute.
:)

My Cleric and Paladin are human and hang out around the Freeport area. I
would like to start a GLBT guild on Veeshan if I can get enough people.

I am interested in hearing from any GLBT people on Veeshan so send me a
message or give me tell.

If you'd like to learn more about me in RL, visit my home page:

http://www.geocities.com/westhollywood/6270

Also, is anyone on the list going to create characters on the new role
playing server that just came online last night?

Hugs,
David
